node.title: Brad Lander is likely to beat a far-right Republican in the comptroller race.
node.alt: Brad Lander, a member of the City Council, is favored in the comptroller race.
node.description: The Republican nominee, Daby Carreras, is a longshot candidate who opposes vaccine mandates.
node.content: ["Brad Lander, a three-term New York City councilman, is expected to win Tuesday\u2019s race for comptroller against Daby Carreras, a Republican aligned with the Trump wing of the party.", "Mr. Lander, 52, from Park Slope, Brooklyn, is running as a left-leaning Democrat, with endorsements from Representative Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (who gets top billing on his campaign website), Senator Elizabeth Warren and the New York City public advocate, Jumaane Williams.", "Mr. Carreras, who Bloomberg reported is a financial adviser at Spartan Capital Securities LLC, is running as a far-right Republican. He is unlikely to win in a city where registered Democrats outnumber Republicans by nearly seven to one.", "The comptroller oversees the city\u2019s public pension funds, whose assets total nearly $300 billion, and audits city agencies.", "The post also frequently attracts politicians with higher aspirations. The departing New York City comptroller, Scott M. Stringer, ran for mayor, as did his two predecessors, John C. Liu and William C. Thompson Jr.", "Mr. Lander supports efforts to make the city\u2019s pension fund investments more environmentally friendly and has promised to expand upon them. As a candidate, he has pledged to help overhaul the way the city invests in infrastructure to make it more efficient and to conduct \u201csharp, strategic\u201d audits of city agencies.", "Mr. Carreras has suggested he would focus entirely on investment returns if elected.", "\u201cThe entire reason why I\u2019m here is because I bring money here,\u201d he said during a debate on NY1. \u201cI\u2019m a money wave. Ching, ching, ching goes the money tree. Every time it chings, money comes to me.\u201d", "He also promises to be a combatant in the culture wars. Mr. Carreras participated in the debate remotely because he declined to provide proof of vaccination \u2014 something he said was a violation of privacy.", "During the debate, the moderator, Errol Louis, cut Mr. Carreras off, saying that NY1 did not traffic in \u201cmisinformation\u201d about the vaccine.", "Mr. Carreras has also been spotted on the campaign trail wearing a yellow Jewish star, of the sort the Nazis made Jews wear during the Holocaust, in protest against vaccine mandates."]
